item.description:
Chianti Restaurant Community Feast

Special RSVP instructions for Chianti Restaurant events:
To RSVP, please use BOTH the Meetup system AND call Rawbert's Organic Garden at 978-922-0004, which is hosting this event at Chianti Restaurant. If you only use the Meetup RSVP system, then you won't be registered. If you only contact Chianti and don't use Meetup, our Meetup stats won't be correct. Thank you for understanding. (Please inform them that the Boston Raw Food Meetup Group referred you.)

Spring up with another scrumptious multi-course, outrageous raw organic feast at Chianti Restaurant in Beverly, MA. Richard's many course meals are really excellent. One price for the meal plus extra for drinks. Call Chianti for details.


For other raw food events in New England, please visit
http://www.RawNewEngl...
Click on the Event Calendar.

Daryl

------------------------
-------------
For Boston Raw Food Meetup posted files, click here:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/files

To promote BRFM, please print & post tear-strip flyer:
files.meetup.com/733136/BostonRawFoodMeetupTear-stripFlyer.pdf

To promote BRFM, please print, cut & hand out these strips of paper:
files.meetup.com/733136/BostonRawFoodMeetup-MemDrive12Up.doc

For upcoming events, please check the calendar:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/calendar

For more information, please check the message board:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/messages/boards

For other raw events around New England
www.RawNewEnglandCommunity.com
